price: Ubwanwa bumaze gupfuka umunwa, ukuri kukabagira, bahisemwo gukoresha igikenye baraheza bavuga bati: “Nyabuna nimuturire Ibrahimu, muheze mwihorere imana zanyu nimwaba mushaka kuzigarukira”.
arabic: قَالُواْ حَرِّقُوهُ وَٱنصُرُوٓاْ ءَالِهَتَكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ فَٰعِلِينَ

meta.transliteration: qālū ḥarriqūhu wa-unṣurū ālihatakum in kuntum fāʿilīna
